Message:
When I read through this book,
I can trace back to my lost
memories.

All are precious footprints
that I no longer remember.

Some of my writing looks like
it’s about to jump off the page
with excitement,

while some is as gloomy
as a dark cloudy day.

It’s funny how easily I can
tell what my emotions were
at the time.

I’m unable to remember
anything, so this is the
only way for me to
regain my memory.

It might seem inconvenient,
but it’s not as bad as it seems.

I find it quite fun to read a story
where I’m the protagonist.
